prompt: Hardly had he arrived $$\underline{}$$ it began to rain.

prompt: I $$\underline{}$$ （凝视） at it for a while, and suddenly realized that: autumn has arrived.

prompt: To his parents' $$\underline{}$$ （满意）, he is admitted to a key university.
analysis: 考查单词拼写。句意：令他父母满意的是，他被一所重点大学录取了。名词所有格parents'后面应接名词形式。satisfaction，n.，满意。且当satisfaction意为"满意，满足"时为抽象名词不可数，故此处应用单数形式。故答案为：satisfaction。

prompt: The coming exam is really one of the greatest $$\underline{}$$ （挑战）for us.
analysis: 考查可数名词的复数形式。句意：即将到来的考试对我们来说是最大的挑战之一。根据句意和空前的one of可知，空格处应该为名词，且为复数形式，再根据中文 "挑战" 提示，可联想到可数名词challenge，根据要求，改为复数形式challenges。故答案为：challenges。

prompt: He lost his leg when he was ten, but learned to $$\underline{}$$ （克服） his difficulties.
analysis: 考查动词拼写。句意：他十岁时失去了一条腿，但他学会了克服困难。分析句子可知his difficulties为名词短语，设空处需要一个动词，又因learn to do sth. 所以设空处应该填动词原形。故overcome（克服）符合，故填overcome。

prompt: We all $$\underline{}$$ （祝贺）our classmate on his becoming one of the Olympic torch holders.
analysis: 考查单词拼写。句意：我们都祝贺我们的同学成为奥运火炬的一员。结合提示，congratulate v. 祝贺，恭喜；符合题意，由于主语we是复数，此处动词用原形即可。故答案为：congratulate。

prompt:

prompt: After the sports meeting, the players, whether they had received medals or not, $$\underline{}$$ （收到回报）warm applause.

prompt: So many jobs­ $$\underline{}$$ getting on well with other people.

prompt: Good listening can show respect, $$\underline{}$$ （促进）understanding and improve interpersonal relationships.

prompt: I $$\underline{}$$ （赏识）your self-confidence and I'm sure you will succeed.

prompt: The puzzled boy wondered why fish soon $$\underline{}$$ （变质）in hot weather. So he went to ask his teacher.

prompt: People in the street $$\underline{}$$ （喜极而泣，weep）when peace was announced.
analysis: 考查动词短语。句意：当宣布和平时，街上的人们喜极而泣。weep with joy为固定表达，意为 "喜极而泣"。根据was announced可知，该句时态为一般过去时，故谓语动词应用过去式。故答案为wept with joy。

prompt: She rushed into the hotel and $$\underline{}$$ （道歉） sincerely for being so late.

prompt: Father asked Anne why she $$\underline{}$$ (go) to bed so late the night before.
analysis: 考查动词时态。父亲问安为什么昨晚她睡得这么晚。在宾语从句中，如果主句是一般现在时，从句可以用任意时态。如果主句用一般过去时，从句只能用过去的某种时态，在本句中go to bed发生在asked之前，要用过去完成时态。故填had gone。

prompt: We $$\underline{}$$  $$\underline{}$$  $$\underline{}$$  $$\underline{}$$ （已经意识到） the problem of pollution and we're trying to do something about it.

prompt: The office workers on strike has $$\underline{}$$ the whole building so far.（占据）

prompt: She $$\underline{}$$ （克服） this fear and in a few years she had a driving licence.
analysis: 考查时态。句意：她克服了这种恐惧，几年后就拿到了驾照。根据并列连词and后的谓语动词had可知句子用一般过去时，根据句意和括号中文提示应填overcome，表示"克服"。动词overcome的过去式为overcame。故答案为overcame。

prompt: She $$\underline{}$$ （弯腰） and picked up a plastic bucket.
analysis: 考查单词拼写和时态。bend，动词，弯腰。由picked可知，本句用一般过去时态。本句句意：她弯腰捡起了塑料桶。故答案为bent。

prompt: Her taste in music $$\underline{}$$  $$\underline{}$$  $$\underline{}$$ （与……相似）mine as we are both big fans of Jay Chou.
analysis: 考查单词拼写。be similar to表示 "与……相似" ；根据后半句中的are可知，前半句的谓语动词的时态应当用一般现在时；本句的主语Her taste为第三人称单数，因此be动词应当用is。故填is similar to。

prompt: If you carefully $$\underline{}$$ （观察） every detail of life, you will have a lot more.
analysis: 考查时态和主谓一致。句意：如果你仔细观察生活的每一个细节，你会拥有的更多。if引导的条件状语从句，主句用一般将来时，从句用一般现在时；主语you为第二人称，根据句意和括号中文提示应填observe，表示"观察"。故答案为observe。

prompt: The study $$\underline{}$$ （表明） a connection between poverty and crime.
analysis: 考查动词。句意：这项研究表明了贫困和犯罪之间的联系。根据句意可知表示客观事实，以及结合主语The study的提示可知一般现在时。故答案为：indicates。

prompt: In 2004, the Ministry of Education put out a notice that students $$\underline{}$$  $$\underline{}$$  $$\underline{}$$ （禁止） living outside their campuses.

prompt: With the police office set up in our school, our safety $$\underline{}$$ （保证）to a large extent.

prompt: The project must $$\underline{}$$ （finish）ahead of the scheduled time.

prompt: Some of them are being $$\underline{}$$ （移走） and some are put into museums.

 $$\underline{}$$  $$\underline{}$$ he made, I would support it.

prompt: There are many places­ $$\underline{}$$ （我们可以参观）in China.（visit）
